results.name: Digits of an idempotent 12-adic number.
reference: V. deGuerre and R. A. Fairbairn, Automorphic numbers, J. Rec. Math., 1 (No. 3, 1968), 173-179.
link: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
V. deGuerre and R. A. Fairbairn, Automorphic numbers, Jnl. Rec. Math., 1 No. 3, (1968), 173-179.
program: (Sage) def a_list(n) : return crt(1, 0, 3^n, 4^n).digits(12) # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 09 2015
xref: The six examples given by deGuerre and Fairbairn are A055620, A054869, A018247, A018248, A259468, A259469.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 02 2015
ext: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Jul 09 2015
